ParticipatingSecuritiesDistributedAndUnd.description: Amount of earnings (loss) distributed and earnings (loss) allocated to participating securities for the basic earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under the two-class method.

PartnersCapitalAccountExchangesAndConver.label: Partners' Capital Account, Exchanges and Conversions
PartnersCapitalAccountExchangesAndConver.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to exchanges and conversions. Partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnits.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units
PartnersCapitalAccountUnits.description: The number of each class of partnership units outstanding at the balance sheet date. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

PaymentsForDepositsOnRealEstateAcquisiti.label: Payments for Deposits on Real Estate Acquisitions
PaymentsForDepositsOnRealEstateAcquisiti.description: Cash outflow related to amounts given in advance to show or confirm an intention to complete an acquisition of land, buildings, other structures, or any item classified as real estate.

PaymentsForHedgeFinancingActivities.label: Payments for Hedge, Financing Activities
PaymentsForHedgeFinancingActivities.description: The cash outflow for a financial contract that meets the hedge criteria as either cash flow hedge, fair value hedge or hedge of net investment in foreign operations.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfPreferredStockAnd.label: Payments for Repurchase of Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfPreferredStockAnd.description: The cash outflow to reacquire preferred stock during the period.

PaymentsOfDebtIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Debt Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfDebtIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow paid to third parties in connection with debt origination, which will be amortized over the remaining maturity period of the associated long-term debt.

PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Common Stock
PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to common shareholders of the parent entity.

PaymentsOfDividendsPreferredStockAndPref.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
PaymentsOfDividendsPreferredStockAndPref.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to preferred shareholders of the parent entity.

PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.label: Payments of Financing Costs
PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.description: The cash outflow for loan and debt issuance costs.

PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Stock Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow for cost incurred directly with the issuance of an equity security.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Gross
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of business during the period. The cash portion only of the acquisition price.

PaymentsToAcquireEquityMethodInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Equity Method Investments
PaymentsToAcquireEquityMethodInvestments.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of or advances to an equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

PaymentsToAcquireLoansReceivable.label: Payments to Acquire Loans Receivable
PaymentsToAcquireLoansReceivable.description: The cash outflow for the purchase of loan receivable arising from the financing of goods and services.

PaymentsToAcquireRealEstate.label: Payments to Acquire Real Estate
PaymentsToAcquireRealEstate.description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of a piece of land, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it and so forth; includes real estate intended to generate income for the owner; excludes real estate acquired for use by the owner.

PaymentsToDevelopRealEstateAssets.label: Payments to Develop Real Estate Assets
PaymentsToDevelopRealEstateAssets.description: Payments to develop real estate assets is the process of adding improvements on or to a parcel of land. Such improvements may include drainage, utilities, subdividing, access, buildings, and any combination of these elements; and are generally classified as cash flow from investing activities.

PaymentsToMinorityShareholders.label: Payments to Noncontrolling Interests
PaymentsToMinorityShareholders.description: Amount of cash outflow to a noncontrolling interest. Includes, but not limited to, reduction of noncontrolling interest ownership. Excludes dividends paid to the noncontrolling interest.

PreferredStockLiquidationPreference.label: Preferred Stock, Liquidation Preference Per Share
PreferredStockLiquidationPreference.description: The per share liquidation preference (or restrictions) of nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) that has a preference in involuntary liquidation considerably in excess of the par or stated value of the shares. The liquidation preference is the difference between the preference in liquidation and the par or stated values of the share.

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets.

ProceedsFromCollectionOfNotesReceivable.label: Proceeds from Collection of Notes Receivable
ProceedsFromCollectionOfNotesReceivable.description: The cash inflow associated with principal collections from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromContributedCapital.label: Proceeds from Contributed Capital
ProceedsFromContributedCapital.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received by a corporation from a shareholder during the period.

ProceedsFromInsuranceSettlementOperating.label: Proceeds from Insurance Settlement, Operating Activities
ProceedsFromInsuranceSettlementOperating.description: Amount of cash inflow for proceeds from settlement of insurance claim, classified as operating activities. Excludes insurance settlement classified as investing activities.

ProceedsFromIssuanceInitialPublicOfferin.label: Proceeds from Issuance Initial Public Offering
ProceedsFromIssuanceInitialPublicOfferin.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from entity's first offering of stock to the public.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSecuredDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Secured Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSecuredDebt.description: The cash inflow from amounts received from issuance of long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes proceeds from tax exempt secured debt.

ProceedsFromLegalSettlements.label: Proceeds from Legal Settlements
ProceedsFromLegalSettlements.description: Cash received for the settlement of litigation during the current period.

ProceedsFromRentsReceived.label: Proceeds from Rents Received
ProceedsFromRentsReceived.description: Cash received for rents during the current period.

ProceedsFromSaleOfNotesReceivable.label: Proceeds from Sale of Notes Receivable
ProceedsFromSaleOfNotesReceivable.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Productive Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.description: The cash inflow from the sale of property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstate.label: Proceeds from Sale of Real Estate
ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstate.description: Cash received for the sale of real estate that is not part of an investing activity during the current period.

ProFormaWeightedAverageSharesOutstanding.label: Pro Forma Weighted Average Shares Outstanding, Diluted
ProFormaWeightedAverageSharesOutstanding.description: The weighted average number of shares or units and dilutive common stock or unit equivalents outstanding in the calculation of proforma diluted earnings per share (earnings per unit), which is commonly presented in initial public offerings based on the terms of the offering.

ProfessionalAndContractServicesExpense.label: Professional and Contract Services Expense
ProfessionalAndContractServicesExpense.description: Professional and contract service expense includes cost reimbursements for support services related to contracted projects, outsourced management, technical and staff support.

ProfessionalFees.label: Professional Fees
ProfessionalFees.description: A fee charged for services from professionals such as doctors, lawyers and accountants. The term is often expanded to include other professions, for example, pharmacists charging to maintain a medicinal profile of a client or customer.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.label: Accounts Receivable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on accounts receivable.

ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.label: Financing Receivable, Credit Loss, Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.description: Amount of credit loss expense (reversal of expense) for financing receivable.

RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciation.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation
RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciation.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation pertaining to real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationRealEst.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation, Investment in Real Estate Sold
RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationRealEst.description: Amount of decrease to accumulated depreciation for real estate investments sold for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationAmou.label: SEC Schedule III, Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Amount of Encumbrances
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationAmou.description: Amount of lien or mortgage outstanding on real estate investment properties for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Building and Improvements, Amount
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of buildings and improvements for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Land, Amount
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.description: Amount of land for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCost.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Cost Capitalized Subsequent to Acquisition, Improvements
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCost.description: Amount of land and buildings and improvements made to real estate investments and capitalized after acquisition for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationInit.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Initial Cost of Building and Improvements
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationInit.description: Initial cost of buildings and improvements for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationInit.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Initial Cost of Land
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationInit.description: Initial cost of land for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

RealEstateCostOfRealEstateSold.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Cost of Investment in Real Estate Sold
RealEstateCostOfRealEstateSold.description: Amount of real estate investments sold for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateFederalIncomeTaxBasis.label: SEC Schedule III, Real Estate, Federal Income Tax Basis
RealEstateFederalIncomeTaxBasis.description: Cost basis of real estate investments for federal income tax purposes for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateGrossAtCarryingValue.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Gross
RealEstateGrossAtCarryingValue.description: Amount, before accumulated depreciation, of real estate investment by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate. Excludes real estate not held as investment or interest.

RealEstateImprovements.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Improvements
RealEstateImprovements.description: Amount of increase in real estate investments related to improvements for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAccumulatedD.label: Real Estate Investment Property, Accumulated Depreciation
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAccumulatedD.description: The cumulative amount of depreciation for real estate property held for investment purposes.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAtCost.label: Real Estate Investment Property, at Cost
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAtCost.description: Amount of real estate investment property which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; and (7) other real estate investments.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet.label: Real Estate Investment Property, Net
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet.description: Amount of real estate investment property, net of accumulated depreciation, which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; and (7) other real estate investments.

RealEstateInvestmentsOther.label: Real Estate Investments, Other
RealEstateInvestmentsOther.description: Amount of real estate owned for income production and capital accretion potential, not otherwise specified in the existing taxonomy. Such real estate excludes that which is occupied or used in the business, for entertainment purposes, or held in inventory for specific purposes.

RealEstateOtherAcquisitions.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Other Acquisition
RealEstateOtherAcquisitions.description: Amount of increase in real estate investments from acquisitions other than through foreclosure for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateRevenueNet.label: Real Estate Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
RealEstateRevenueNet.description: The aggregate revenue from real estate operations during the reporting period.

RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityCa.label: Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest, Equity, Carrying Amount
RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityCa.description: As of the reporting date, the aggregate carrying amount of all noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. This item includes noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) regardless of the type of equity interest (common, preferred, other) including all potential organizational (legal) forms of the investee entity.

RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityCo.label: Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest, Equity, Common, Carrying Amount
RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityCo.description: As of the reporting date, the carrying amount of noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. The noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) may be in the form of common shares (regardless of class), limited partnership units (regardless of class), non-preferential membership interests, or any other form of common equity regardless of investee entity legal form.

RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityOt.label: Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest, Equity, Other, Carrying Amount
RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityOt.description: Amount of noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the parent entity, classified as other equity.

RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityPr.label: Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest, Equity, Preferred, Carrying Amount
RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityPr.description: As of the reporting date, the carrying amount of noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. The noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) may be in the form of preferred shares (regardless of class), preferred partnership units (regardless of class), preferential membership interests, or any other form of preferred equity regardless of investee entity legal form.

RepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.label: Repayments of Secured Debt
RepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.description: The cash outflow to repay long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes repayments of tax exempt secured debt.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Operating Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability.

SECScheduleIIIRealEstateAccumulatedDepre.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation, Depreciation Expense
SECScheduleIIIRealEstateAccumulatedDepre.description: Amount of depreciation expense of real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

SecuredDebt.label: Secured Debt
SecuredDebt.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date, including the current and noncurrent portions, of collateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer). Such obligations include mortgage loans, chattel loans, and any other borrowings secured by assets of the borrower.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Forfeited in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that were forfeited during the reporting period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Grants in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of grants made during the period on other than stock (or unit) option plans (for example, phantom stock or unit plan, stock or unit appreciation rights plan, performance target plan).

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average fair value at grant date for nonvested equity-based awards issued during the period on other than stock (or unit) option plans (for example, phantom stock or unit plan, stock or unit appreciation rights plan, performance target plan).

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Nonvested, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of non-vested equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that validly exist and are outstanding as of the balance sheet date.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Nonvested, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Per share or unit weighted-average fair value of nonvested award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Number of Shares Authorized
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of shares authorized for issuance under share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Number of Shares Available for Grant
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The difference between the maximum number of shares (or other type of equity) authorized for issuance under the plan (including the effects of amendments and adjustments), and the sum of: 1) the number of shares (or other type of equity) already issued upon exercise of options or other equity-based awards under the plan; and 2) shares (or other type of equity) reserved for issuance on granting of outstanding awards, net of cancellations and forfeitures, if applicable.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Acquisitions
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.description: Value of stock issued pursuant to acquisitions during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Units
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: Value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of units. An example of a convertible unit is an umbrella partnership real estate investment trust unit (UPREIT unit).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Restricted Stock Award, Forfeitures
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.description: Value of stock related to Restricted Stock Awards forfeited during the period.

StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased and retired during the period. The excess of the purchase price over par value can be charged against retained earnings (once the excess is fully allocated to additional paid in capital).

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased during the period and has not been retired and is not held in treasury. Some state laws may mandate the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

StockRepurchaseProgramNumberOfSharesAuth.label: Stock Repurchase Program, Number of Shares Authorized to be Repurchased
StockRepurchaseProgramNumberOfSharesAuth.description: The number of shares authorized to be repurchased by an entity's Board of Directors under a stock repurchase plan.

StraightLineRentAdjustments.label: Straight Line Rent Adjustments
StraightLineRentAdjustments.description: Amount of the adjustment to rental revenues to measure escalating leasing revenues on a straight line basis.

TaxesPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Taxes Payable
TaxesPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes.

TemporaryEquityParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Temporary Equity, Par or Stated Value Per Share
TemporaryEquityParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Per share amount of par value or stated value of stock classified as temporary equity. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable.

TemporaryEquitySharesAuthorized.label: Temporary Equity, Shares Authorized
TemporaryEquitySharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of securities classified as temporary equity that are permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

TemporaryEquitySharesIssued.label: Temporary Equity, Shares Issued
TemporaryEquitySharesIssued.description: The number of securities classified as temporary equity that have been sold (or granted) to the entity's shareholders. Securities issued include securities outstanding and securities held in treasury. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

TemporaryEquitySharesOutstanding.label: Temporary Equity, Shares Outstanding
TemporaryEquitySharesOutstanding.description: The number of securities classified as temporary equity that have been issued and are held by the entity's shareholders. Securities outstanding equals securities issued minus securities held in treasury. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

TemporaryEquityValueExcludingAdditionalP.label: Temporary Equity, Par Value
TemporaryEquityValueExcludingAdditionalP.description: Carrying amount of the par value of temporary equity outstanding. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

TenantReimbursements.label: Tenant Reimbursements (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
TenantReimbursements.description: In accordance with the provisions of their lease agreement, this element represents allowable charges due a landlord from its tenant. In retail store and office building leases, for example, tenant reimbursements may cover items such as taxes, utilities, and common area expenses.

UndistributedEarningsLossAllocatedToPart.label: Undistributed Earnings (Loss) Allocated to Participating Securities, Diluted
UndistributedEarningsLossAllocatedToPart.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) allocated to participating securities for the diluted earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under the two-class method.

VariableLeaseCost.label: Variable Lease, Cost
VariableLeaseCost.description: Amount of variable lease cost, excluded from lease liability, recognized when obligation for payment is incurred for finance and operating leases.

WeightedAverageBasicSharesOutstandingPro.label: Weighted Average Basic Shares Outstanding, Pro Forma
WeightedAverageBasicSharesOutstandingPro.description: The weighted average number of shares (units) outstanding in the calculation of pro forma basic earnings per share (earnings per unit), which is commonly presented in initial public offerings based on the terms of the offering.

WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.label: Weighted Average Limited Partnership Units Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.description: Weighted average number of limited partnership units outstanding determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that limited partnership units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.label: Write off of Deferred Debt Issuance Cost
WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.description: Write-off of amounts previously capitalized as debt issuance cost in an extinguishment of debt.

Goodwill.label: Goodwill
Goodwill.description: Amount after accumulated impairment loss of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

IntangibleAssetsNetExcludingGoodwill.label: Intangible Assets, Net (Excluding Goodwill)
IntangibleAssetsNetExcludingGoodwill.description: Sum of the carrying amounts of all intangible assets, excluding goodwill, as of the balance sheet date, net of accumulated amortization and impairment charges.

LineOfCreditFacilityCommitmentFeePercent.label: Line of Credit Facility, Commitment Fee Percentage
LineOfCreditFacilityCommitmentFeePercent.description: The fee, expressed as a percentage of the line of credit facility, for the line of credit facility regardless of whether the facility has been used.

NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionOtherLiab.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Other Liabilities Assumed
NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionOtherLiab.description: Amount of liabilities, classified as other, assumed in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash or part noncash acquisition.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

ReceivableWithImputedInterestFaceAmount.label: Receivable with Imputed Interest, Face Amount
ReceivableWithImputedInterestFaceAmount.description: The principal amount of the receivable or note before consideration of the discount or premium.

SECScheduleIIIRealEstateAndAccumulatedDe.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Cost Capitalized Subsequent to Acquisition, Land
SECScheduleIIIRealEstateAndAccumulatedDe.description: Amount of land costs capitalized since acquisition for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

AdjustmentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForSha.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Decrease for Tax Withholding Obligation
AdjustmentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForSha.description: Amount of decrease to equity for grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

DerivativeAssets.label: Derivative Asset
DerivativeAssets.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.label: Gain (Loss) on Extinguishment of Debt
GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.description: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease.

PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.label: Payment, Tax Withholding, Share-based Payment Arrangement
PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.description: Amount of cash outflow to satisfy grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Forfeitures, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average fair value as of the grant date of equity-based award plans other than stock (unit) option plans that were not exercised or put into effect as a result of the occurrence of a terminating event.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that vested during the reporting period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average fair value as of grant date pertaining to an equity-based award plan other than a stock (or unit) option plan for which the grantee gained the right during the reporting period, by satisfying service and performance requirements, to receive or retain shares or units, other instruments, or cash in accordance with the terms of the arrangement.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, before Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, before forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

TransferToOtherRealEstate.label: Real Estate Owned, Transfer to Real Estate Owned
TransferToOtherRealEstate.description: Value transferred from mortgage loans to real estate owned (REO) in noncash transactions.

DeferredRevenue.label: Deferred Revenue
DeferredRevenue.description: Amount of deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

NotesAndLoansPayableCurrent.label: Notes and Loans Payable, Current
NotesAndLoansPayableCurrent.description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of the portions of all long-term notes and loans payable due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfRedeemablePreferr.label: Payments for Repurchase of Redeemable Preferred Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfRedeemablePreferr.description: The cash outflow for reacquisition of callable preferred stock.

PaymentsToAcquireMachineryAndEquipment.label: Payments to Acquire Machinery and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquireMachineryAndEquipment.description: The cash outflow for acquisition of machinery and equipment.

CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1.label: Debt Instrument, Basis Spread on Variable Rate
DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1.description: Percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the debt instrument.

DefinedContributionPlanEmployerDiscretio.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Employer Discretionary Contribution Amount
DefinedContributionPlanEmployerDiscretio.description: Amount of discretionary contributions made by an employer to a defined contribution plan.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstateOtherAdditions.label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Other Addition
MortgageLoansOnRealEstateOtherAdditions.description: Amount of addition to investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate, classified as other.

OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.label: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.description: Weighted average discount rate for operating lease calculated at point in time.

PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansReceivable.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Loans Receivable
PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansReceivable.description: The net amount paid or received by the reporting entity associated with purchase (sale or collection) of loans receivable arising from the financing of goods and services.

ProceedsFromCollectionOfFinanceReceivabl.label: Proceeds from Collection of Finance Receivables
ProceedsFromCollectionOfFinanceReceivabl.description: The cash inflow associated with the collection of receivables arising from the financing of goods and services.
